comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: The link, captioned above as "Find out more about this photograph" is malformed (it tries to go to another Flickr page). I do wish all of the supplemental information for photographs in your amazing collections was included on the individual Flickr page ... rather than having to click on the "Find out more" link for every photograph!

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content:
Thanks for pointing out the incorrect link, Pixel Wrangler. 

Including more information about each photo on the individual Flickr pages is definitely something for the State Library team to consider before our next batch upload.
